page.title: 08SOCIAL CONCERNS - Lingdale.
page.content: {Lingdale}is a small village in East Cleveland. It was formally a {mining community}dependant on the now exhausted{iron-stone}mines. Most of the{houses}are{terraced;}some are empty. I think it would be a good{idea if these{houses}were{demolished}and {new ones built. There are very{few play-areas}in Lingdale. I would demolish some of the old{empty shops}and build play-areas. The{spoil-heaps}have been{levelled}and some{new houses}have been built, together with a{new Primary school}and {community centre.}The old school has been converted to a{Youth Training {Centre.}I think there should be a new {shopping-centre}in Lingdale as well as a{comprehensive school}and{sports {centre.}If these were planned it would create more{jobs}for the area.
